byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and PATRICK HEALY

abstract: Hillary Clinton, who was diagnosed with pneumonia and decided to keep knowledge of illness to close circle of aides and family, says in hindsight she should have revealed diagnosis; says she thought she could continue with her relatively light schedule while recovering and will release more health documentation; presses for more transparency from Donald Trump.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Set Back by Call to Keep Illness a Secret
headline.main: Hillary Clinton Is Set Back by Decision to Keep Illness Secret

snippet: Her campaign, responding to political pressure after it belatedly revealed that she had pneumonia, promised more details about her health and medical records this week....
lead_paragraph: Her campaign, responding to political pressure after it belatedly revealed that she had pneumonia, promised more details about her health and medical records this week.
